name: The Horus Heresy: Battle of Tallarn - Iron Edition
description: The Horus Heresy: Battle of Tallarn is a turn-based strategy game that recreates one of the most important events in Imperial history. Command a vast array of tanks, Dreadnoughts, Knights and Titans across the toxic landscape.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
